title: MongoDB Performance Tuning
subject: MongoDB
theory: Performance tuning involves identifying bottlenecks. The Database Profiler collects data on slow operations. `cursor.explain()` reveals if a query uses an index or scans the collection.

examples.explanation: IXSCAN means index used (Good). COLLSCAN means full scan (Bad).

interview_questions.question: What is the difference between IXSCAN and COLLSCAN?
interview_questions.answer: IXSCAN is an index scan. COLLSCAN is a full collection scan (checking every document).

summary: Proactive tuning ensures scalability as user counts grow.
